name: Buy Jumpseller
author: Rafael da Costa

sections.description:
Use a WordPress product id shortcode on a post to display a buy button that will link directly to your Jumpseller product page

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

Buy Jumpseller

Buy Jumseller is a BETA WordPress PlugIn

  • Use a WordPress product id shortcode on a post to display a buy button that will link directly to your Jumpseller product page
  • Short code format is : [jumpseller product_id=”value”]

Presentation
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin See: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/19VWws5OCrvrZtih4dpb4RzW0zThf56IQ9kHK0xAfFso/edit?usp=sharing
